entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -21.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
